Own the streets of Dunkopolis, an urban up-and-coming city, in Street Shuffle, a brand new strategic card game! Join forces with other performers, take on challengers, and amaze the crowd with your skills. 

Play as Ace, a street magician busking on the street for extra cash. Along the way, you meet a mascot, a contortionist, and a mime; three other performers who, after seeing your skills, work together with you to woo over the crowds. However, your skills haven’t gone unnoticed. Your party faces other performers who are upset with your sudden boost in popularity. You must battle to gain the affection of the crowd and control of the street!

Key Features:

  • Enjoy dialogue between characters.
  • Learn quickly.
  • Build your deck.
  • Improve your party.
  • Experience hours of gameplay.
  • Face challenging enemies.
  • Listen to an original, groovy soundtrack.

This game was made for the MassDiGi XP 1 Internship. I played a key role in the design of the game as well as producer and project manager.
